channel.title: Goudont V3 Release. [Quests || Loyalty titles || Dungeoneering || Membership..]
channel.description:
CREDZ: -Shawn (15%) -MezzyScape (20%) -Kennelz (20%) -Me (30%) -Kevin (15%)
For those getting the Unetreemarshall error, you're gonna have to use jre6, also, if that doesn't work, you have to redownload source, and extract ALL files.
LINKS:
~SOURCE~ [MediaFire] http://www.mediafire.com/?id5cy9zo2mvc7wi ~CLIENT~ [MediaFire] [SUPPORTS AUTO CACHE DOWNLOAD] http://www.mediafire.com/?jf7gtzsm05w2llb
~SOURCE~ [Uppit] http://uppit.com/frz19k6d9d53/Goudont_668.rar
~CLIENT~[Uppit] [SUPPORTS AUTO CACHE DOWNLOAD] http://uppit.com/su06hh6uecfu/[Test_client].rar [COPY/PASTE THE URL IN YOUR URL BAR]
MIRROR SITE: [url=http://fife.zapto.org/up/download.php?file=946Goudont668.rar]Sexy Mirror site for SOURCE[/url] [Sexy upload site]
[url=http://goo.gl/x7yyV]Sexy mirror site for CLIENT[/url] [Client] [Cache supported]
If you wanna add things to upload, visit [[url=http://qikup.tk]qikup.tk[/url]]
I decided to release this. I can't get any players on this, can't do shit. I work hard on it, but I can't advertise well. Maybe someone will make good use of this.
This is GOUDONT 562/668. Version 3.
You will love because it has full economy, player vs player with pk points! Membership rank (sexy benefits + adding more) skilling, completionist cape, all skill capes, quests... tons more! Here are some of the new things I added. [*NOTE*] [size=14pt]I AM NOT LISTING THE LITTLE THINGS I HAVE ADDED, BECAUSE I LITERALLY ADDED 200 OF THEM, ALONG WITH FIXES.[/size]
- Added NEX (flawless 100% with all magic, melee... etc)
-[color=green]Donator benefits added + donator days -[color=green]Skilling, full economy + PKing with PK points - Completely redone fletching with interface, propper task completion (making the arrow shafts, adding feathers, then arrow heads) [Got too lazy to do stocks(Crossbows) :P ] - Added Propper net hunting + Placed the npcs scattered through the ::hunt place [Up to you if you want to place the pirate implings ] - You can customly choose your own loyalty title, and create it via ::title [title name choice] --- (Only for Extreme Members)
- QUESTS (3 members, 2 non members) [NEW ADDED : A friend in need] - NEW HOME - GOOD, EVIL rank : You have a position in the server that if you do bad(evil) things, like killing npcs, stealing, doing some quests in a bad rank.. etc. And if you do good things, like doing SOME of the GOOD quests, burrying bones, etc. (UPDATED!) - Dungeoneering (10 floors max) : This is a custom make of dungeoneering, with 10 floors, killcounts and stuff, and at the 10th floor, you fight the boss, and when you beat it, you prestige 1+. - NEW pets added - Prices fixed - ::membercommands (opens a panel, and you click the button and it works with you) - Added Member/Extreme Member rank - Member rank gives 3x exp to skills - Extreme Member rank gives 5x exp to skills
INFORMATION: I kinda messed up on x10 hits, ONLY for npcs, can't figure out what to remove >.< The npcs hit x100 on you instead of x10. The rest x10 features are fine/ LINKS: ~CLIENT~ http://www.mediafire.com/?557dekla3tmn0s6
~SOURCE~ http://www.mediafire.com/?id5cy9zo2mvc7wi
I couldn't get this server going, I tried advertising, but no players played. I just couldn't get a hold of this source running, so I am releasing it to the public, and hopefully, someone will be very successfull with it if they decide to use it.
~[b][u]SOME[/u][/b] PICS ~ [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/6122/56113666.png[/img] [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/2371/46038079.png[/img] Them dialogues nd shit, all spawned npcs talk to you [img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5661/12411106.png[/img] I worked a bit more on the Good/evil rank. [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/2758/46770144.png[/img]
Just check the source if you wanna see more features. I don't wanna write anymore.
Any questions, help, friend, add up skype.
skype user: goudont

[quote=“pwnsrd, post:51, topic:452918”][quote author=goudont link=topic=555780.msg4073936#msg4073936 date=1344623586]

Much love, microscape [:

Hello all, when i run the source i get this error message in cmd.
http://i34.servimg.com/u/f34/17/44/42/34/rgergg10.png

How can i be mising a few files if i downled it ???

you gotta update yer java

I have java 7 update 5 dude? and when i installed it just afgter readign your post it said it has already been installed on your computer?

Alright then redownload the source, you may be missing a few files.

I’m not sure if you mean you have the same problem, but if you do, you have to download fully, and extract it to a folder, and you gotta extract ALL files.
[/quote]

i get the same error too :/[/quote]

Downgrade your java to JRE6

Read full topic
